content.detailedDescription: We were on our way home from a family trip in an rv and we were stopped at a stop sign. then i looked over and saw this thing kind of floating in one spot. my mom didn't stay very long but i was able to get one picture of what i saw.
content.summary: Sighted from rv

content.detailedDescription:
We live out in the country in the ozark/rogersville area. during the day, a friend and i lit a fire. after lighting the fire, my friend noticed a plane-like structure off in the distance emitting red lights. the sky was clear with hardly a cloud, but i couldn't see what she was seeing, even after moving behind her into her field of vision. we laugh about it and move along. this was approximately 5-6pm central time.

around 9:00 pm central time, we gathered our things to leave. after locking the house and loading the dog into the car, my friend and i sit down in the front seats of the car, ready to start the ignition. i then see a flash of three, bright white lights in my peripheral vision. they were stacked like a triangle, with two lights on the bottom and one on top. i immediately got out of the car to get closer to the object that appeared after the flash of lights. (my friend, on the other hand, told me she was so scared for her life that she didn't move from her passenger seat in the vehicle). 

the object that appeared above the house was about 500 feet from us, and about 50-60 feet up in the air. it was unlike anything i've ever seen. it appeared hollow, but not like any hollow 3d structure in that i couldn't detect  a definite inside edge. there were bright white lights on the structure that appeared to glow from the inside out. initially, i believed it to be helicopter-sized. 

i started yelling to my friend, "what is that?!" that is when this object stopped hovering above the house and changed directions, coming right toward us in our car. it appeared to be getting smaller the closer it got to us, but never smaller than about 15x15ft. about 50 feet before our car, this object descends down towards us in a u-shape, then corrects itself and gains elevation. at its lowest point in the descent, i thought it might hit our car and i was afraid for my life -it was no more than 30 feet directly above the top of our car. 

it then regained its initial elevation of maybe 50 feet, and disappeared into the tree line at the edge of the property. we immediately turned on the car, pulled out onto the main road and attempted to see it again, but it had disappeared. 

the most interesting part of this was not only the almost indescribable shape, but that it seemed to know we were leaving the property. it's very obvious (and terrifying) lurch towards our car was either on purpose (maybe to scare us?) or the result of whatever was operating it losing control of the structure. either way, this appeared and disappeared out of nowhere with a clear intent that we should see it. 

additionally, this object was completely silent and appeared incredibly aerodynamic. it wasn't inherently malevolent, but also didn't appear to be particularly friendly or welcoming. i honestly  love reading about ufos, but now that i have actually seen one...I wish i hadn't. this was a very scary experience.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4d glowing structure appeared above house after a flash of three lights.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on front porch of my apartment eating and listening to the starborn connection radio show on kgra when my girlfriend noted a distant object in the sky about 30 degrees elevation to the south south-west. we thought it was either a bird or airplane but there was no sound, no lights, no flapping of wings. the object traveling in a smooth movement from east to west when we first saw it.

as we watched, we debated whether it was a bird or aircraft. i initially thought it was an eagle soaring over the mississippi river, near my apartment. we continued to watch it as it moved and slowly curved its flight path toward the north. we also noted that it was near dusk and we wondered if it were an airplane, whether it would have lights visible. 

we eventually lost sight of it in the tree line along the river.
total sighting time was about eight seconds.


note: it was about 30 minutes into the show, so we estimate it was probably at about 9:30 pm cdt.
the sun was down and there was a partial moon visible.
weather was clear, with a few scattered high cirrus clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Distant dark object observed in arc from ssw to wnw over eight second flight path

content.detailedDescription: Inadvertently caught this in pic
content.summary: Took pic of air field tower at auto event, did not see it until looked at pic

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for a friend in my car. i had the sunroof open. i happened to look up at the sky, i was looking at the clouds, and saw 2 white dots moving i was like no way. they were moving slowly same speed. i looked hard, and saw around 10 objects, solid white lights, they seemed quite high up. there's no way anyone would have seen it if they weren't looking for it. they were very inconspicuous. they were not arranged in any formation. i tried to look very intently, and i was by myself, and was not able to take pictures. i couldn't see much detail, but as i looked at them, i noticed one object that seemed higher than the rest, but it was different and weird. it had 2 lights with a purple-like figure 8 pattern going between the 2 lights. i could barely see it but i did make it out. the impression i got, if it matters, was that they were chilling, taking in the sights. they were all going the same exact speed. i didn't feel like it was military, or anything manmade but who knows? they disappeared over the trees and that was it. this is my first ufo sighting. i'm going to guess they were 10-20 miles up. hard to tell.
content.summary: 10 small lights moving slow same dir.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had a sleeping problem for quite a while. i sometimes go into my back garden patio area for a cigarette and a change of temperature etc...
i saw the craft approach from the west or just sswest. it glided over the houses at the rear of my garden by about 10 feet. just above the chimney stacks. my garden is 90 feet long which backs onto smaller gardens approximately 20 feet. so it was pretty close. the craft was about 30 feet from nose to stern. it didn't make a sound. it just glided above the house at the rear of my garden with a slight glow coming from a central orb in its centre. as it flew off to my left in the easterly direction i could see small red lights in each corner of the craft. the craft was moving very slowly approx.' 20-40 mph.
i have served in the military with classified observational skills.
i know what i saw and i could draw it anytime if asked?
what struck me was how quiet it was except for a low hum, almost like an electrical arcing motor. there was no smell in the air and no movement by the large conifer tree it passed at the bottom of my garden. i didn't feel threatened and i was quite elated to have witnessed it! 
i would swear under oath that this is true.
the photo i am submitting is a like for like picture that i could only find from the internet. except the centre orb was white light and red small lights in each corner of the craft.
content.summary: Black triangular craft with white dome in the centre and red lights in each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I had watched this light the night before about the same time. i was standing in front yard driveway when i saw it again.  i saw the light descending at a slow pace and i also notice jet planes in the sky that where twice as high.  at first i thought it was a satellite but it was too bright and too low to be a star or a plane.  then started descending then it turned in a circular motion and headed in the other direction. it moved slow and steady. excited and yelled at my wife and son to bring the phone to record the event. the object moved to the northeast and got real bright and disappeared like it just blinked off.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like light orb descending in the nw sky then did a 160 and went ne got bright and disappareared into the skyy

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my truck on the second level of the hilton parking garage making phone calls, when i noticed something reflective moving in a nnw direction high in altitude.  i thought it could be a jet going to the airport, but it had no features.  i watched it move from my pov from the south towards the north while i was facing the west, i watched until it passed behind a cloud.  i saw no details, other than it was quite large and it was shiny- close to what i would guess was disk like- but i cant say for certain.  i consider it a ufo for the reason- it had no features, it was very shiny, large and moved very fast.
content.summary: Saw saucer like object in the sky near convention center

content.detailedDescription:
I was in las vegas for the first time on a business trip in april 2016. i was walking around taking pictures of everything like a normal tourist. i came across the street of the eiffel tower replica. i snapped a couple of pictures and did not notice the ufo with my own eyes but only noticed it within my photos. 

the ufo moves from significantly from one picture to the other. with the angle i was at when looking straight up there are no buildings higher than the tower. the object looks like a diamond shaped sheet of electricity with a rectangle in the middle of it that looks like an opening. there are 10 smaller rectangular openings/holes that are spaced evenly and surrounding the one in the middle. 

i do not remember my initial reaction but i definitely wanted to show my father to get his opinion on my photos.
content.summary: I was  taking pictures of the eiffel tower replica in las vegas and noticed a blue diamond shape flying  light within the pictures i took.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were enjoying the night out on the boat at our camp in mansfield, quebec near " bryson lake lodge outfitters". we had no light on the boat, it was a beautiful opened clear sky. so we're just sitting in the boat and talking and looking at the stars. when we noticed an object in the sky moving arround in ways that an airplane wouldn't be able to move. we lost sight of it and made nothing of it when suddenly we noticed something above the trees across the lake. it was square shaped. had a big bright light on top wich made it hard to see the shape. it was hovering arround like it was searching for something and i guess it couldn't see us on the lake. we observed it for a good 30 minutes until i descided to take my flashlight and make signals at it. shortly after that, it dimed it's light and disappeared.

it also came back the next night at the same time. we observed it doing the same thing then it flew back in the sky till we lost sight .
content.summary: Square shaped with a constant white bright light at the top of it. made no sound what so ever

content.detailedDescription:
I have 5 photos taken by a game camera over a 100 minute period the night of july 23 so i did not personally observe anything.  the main lights (i'm not sure if they were lights or reflection of the camera flash) were 8 rectangles in a horizontal string that moved from one photo to the next.  in the last 3 photos there's also a round light that varied in intensity and also moved horizontally with the string of lights - it is to the left of the string.  in the last two photos there was a deer and the last photo has the deer and a raccoon near the lights. 

i discovered these photos july 29 when i checked the sim card from the camera.  i have never seen such lights on photos from this camera in the months it has been in this location.  there is nothing out of the ordinary present in the area the lights had appeared.
content.summary: Five photos of 8 to 9 lights at ground level taken by a game camera

content.detailedDescription: On backyard deck ,looked straight up and saw seven bright lights directly above us in a v formation. i saw it first yelled out and my daughter saw it as well. it was travelling really fast and made no sound.It was going south coming from the north. i knew right away it was a formation of ufo's. it couldn't be anything else as it was going so fast and made no sound.
content.summary: Seven bright white lights flying in v formation directly above us really fast no sound

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:50 pm on 07/29/2017 driving south to north on hwy 26 just outside of warm springs or my wife noticed a bright white/blue light in the sky, she pointed and asked what is that?  we both watched it take a slightly curved path to the north east, excellerated rapidly as it assented and dissapearded.  the white/blue light got significantly brighter as it accelerated and ascended out of sight.  the brightness and color of the object in the sky. due to its brightness and speed we were unsure, it was not a shooting star or airplane. we were amazed at how bright and fast it was, after we discussed what we had seen and ruled out shooting stars, airplanes, and conventional aircraft.  it excellerated out of view..
content.summary: Bright blue white light rapidly flying s to n ascende and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My usual routine that night was to take my dog out for his nightly relief.
while waiting by the side of my house i was looking down at the ground
when it lit up with a white light from above. i looked up just to see a
white glowing orb zip by. within a micro second, a greenish-bluish orb
followed close behind. they were fast moving and made absolutely no sound.
i could not see where they flew since trees obstructed my line of sight.
nothing else happened.
content.summary: White orb lit the ground then followed by a greenish-blue orb fast moving, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I went out to smoke a cigarette. i saw a light flash behind me. then i saw something move across the sky way up near the stars like a shooting star. i ran in the house to get my husband. we stood outside for a while as i explained what happened. then we both saw it really close over the trees. it looked like a comet leaving a trail. it was bright white light with a slight hint of blue. no sound. it disappeared. i saw it a total of three times.I went into the garage to smoke another cigarette after speakingv with a few people on the phone. i was afraid to open my garage door so i left it closed. my friend suggested i go upstairs to sleep. i closed the door to the house. we woke up a few hours later and my garage door was wide open.
content.summary: Flashed light behind me, disappeared, reappeared over trees in front of me. like a shooting comet

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to pigeon forge my girlfriend noticed an object. i thought it was just the cellphone tower with a red light in the distance, then corrected her. she then told me that i wasn't looking at the correct thing. i then noticed about 100 meters above the surface was an object with slow rotation, and white blinking lights on each appendage that pulsed slowly across the two. the object was triangular or square, though a rotation was present i didn't get to see a full rotation, and only one light was active at a time. in the centre of the object was a large sphere, which seemed to produce some sort of plume that extended roughly 5 meters from the sphere. the appendages only produced the white lights from what seemed to be greyish circles. the object was shaped somewhat like a pyramid, with convex sides, like the attached drawings. on the exterior of the object, the triangular features seemed build up to the sphere in an overlapping pattern, and did the same but inverse on the inside leading up to the sphere. imagine there's more layers of triangles overlapping in the attached (poorly drawn)drawing. that convex shape on the sides is nicely displayed, though. the drawing is of a top view.  

the object approached relatively fast. the speed of my vehicle was around 75 mph the whole way. while the vehicle approached at about 60 m/s, it slowed to about 25 m/s once it reached me. it seemed to follow a straight path in my time observing it. when i wasn't able to focus on it, my girlfriend noticed it's closest point was about 200 metres from us. at this point it appeared to be about 15 metres in diameter. my girlfriend pointed out that it flew over the road, then simply vanished once we had driven about half a kilometre from the closest approach. 

personally, i'm an avid rocketry nerd. it somewhat comforted me to know that that could have been an extraterrestrial vehicle, regardless of the chances. i'm sure others may have had a different reaction. i simply wished that i could study it, and it peaked my curiosity my whole journey. as for my girlfriend, it was a mixture of fear and excitement.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular object with smaller triangular features over interstate 81

content.detailedDescription: While driving on the highway near berge, germany, i took a series of photos of a huge white cloud that was very beautiful. driving through the countryside we were passing some giant windmills that i thought would look nice to take a photo of with the giant cloud in the background. i took the photos and then then i looked over them in my photo gallery and that's when i noticed a black object in the last photo. the object does not appear in any other pictures (although possibly as a spot in the picture i took immediately previously). there are no black spots on the window so i know it is not a window spot. i did not see the object when taking the picture, only upon the review of the photo did i notice it.
content.summary: Object observed flying through clouds in photo

content.detailedDescription: Outside my house every morning around 430 am to about sunrise, there is a bright light that starts out drifting in one direction, then right before the sun rises, it slowly drifts away into the atmosphere.The light is so bright that it catches my eye every time and it noticeably moves across the sky. it first looked like a star but it moves too fast to be a star and too slow to be a plane.  no other planes appear during this time and there is no loud sound. it puzzled me and made me question what it could possibly be but i could not find a logical explanation. it eventually drifts off into the atmosphere and disappears from sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light hovers nightly in distance slowly elevating and then slowly drifts away as sun rises

content.detailedDescription:
Earlier this evening wile talking with friends on the chehalis indian reservation, when two of us happened to notice what appeared ro be a bright star, yet in the same slice of sky a few other stars were becoming visible and there was a commercial airline following a north bound flight plan, and it was then (less than 20 seconds we could see the unidentified object had already descended to a bit over the i-5 flight corridor, and was still descending so fast we thought maybe it was a jet crashing.

at its height (far above commercial lights and lanes) it appeared twinkly white just like stars, it took approx. 35 seconds to descended to under the airline lights, then another 10 to pass by the tops of 100-140 foot cedar and douglas fir trees. as it passed, at a steep descent, the color changed to a greenish blue and got lighter in color from front to back, appearing to be 2 or 3 times the height of the trees.

the object was totally silent, crossed from approximately 50 degrees above the southern horizon, to approximately 15-20 degrees about the northern horizon and covered the heights and distances mentioned in about 80 seconds or less. there was no flash, explosion, nor other indication of ground impact.

the only thing that was more worrying than seeing an object like that after over half a century with never seeing anything come from so high, to so low, so fast with no heat, smoke, flame, or exhaust, was on my way home, as i got closer to interstate 5, i began to develop an odd headache accompanied by a sound i know from being a studio musician had two tones...One in the 22-42 hertz range and the other up in the 60khz range (near a harmonic) and i got slightly nauseous with a dull headache. all physical symptoms faded away the further south and west i got from the reservation.

there was one other person who saw it from start to finish, but since i heard of no other report yet, i thought i'd like to file one.
content.summary: Star descended to jet altitude,changed bule to green rapod to 400_ feet

content.detailedDescription: At 7:40 am on july 29,2017 i had just crossed the border from oklahoma into kansas.  i noticed a very bright light in the sky to the northeast.  i assumed it was sunlight reflecting off of an airplane, but while i was watching it, it suddenly vanished.  i kept looking, thinking i would see the plane, but there was nothing there and it was a clear day with no clouds.  the only way i could describe it would be that it was as bright or brighter than the brightest star in the sky at night, but it was broad daylight and there were no stars out.  i pulled over and looked for a plane, but never saw anything.  it was very confusing.
content.summary: I had just crossed the border from ok into ks.  i saw a very bright light in the sky. lasted about 3 seconds and vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
10:30 pm talking on phone with friend sitting at upstairs bedroom window. a 10 foot diameter black saucer with heat signature around it, flew over the house at about 20 feet above me and hovered across the street on the river levee. it hovered next to a large tree and then tipped up on its side moved parallel to the tree and then moved in front of the tree and a watery ball enveloped it and the black saucer separated into 3 parts, like 3 discs stacked up in the watery ball settled on the levee as it landed and disappeared. i was speaking to my freind on the phone and was describing what i was seeing the whole time.

i told her i was going down stairs to look out the front door, and i saw a white suv across the street, so i went back upstairs to master bathroom, hung up the phone and brushed my teeth getting ready for bed and the sink vanity started moving up and down and side to side and i had to hold on to the vanity. i thought i was going to fall down or pass out.

after that i went into the master bedroom and got my dog clara so we could go downstairs for her potty time and as i approached the top of the stairs, they started separating from the wall and a intense white light was seen coming up from under the stairs and coming through it as it unzipped about 6 feet down from the top of the stairs from the wall. the opening was about 18 to 24 inches wide and both me and clara went down the stairs anyway and the stair sealed back up.

we came back upstairs and got in bed and fell asleep. at about 2:20am, heard a sound of a diesel truck air brakes release, looked at my video door bell monitor for the downstairs front door and saw  bright white cloud, so i took several still photos of it. then 2 cats walked on the roof, they were domestic cats, one came up to the window and looked at me and then turned and faced away from me, the other cat sat at a distance in a straight line from the other cat a crouched down and starred at me...It was like they were there to protect me. 

in the morning i turned the brightness contrast down on the video door bell camera video phone, and then seen aliens, a panda bear, a insect, and other beings, one image lost was a cacassian long blond haired man that looked like fabian, in a spandex suit and cape and head band. he was behind the other creatures that came back later, 100's of them the came to visit me, and still to this day 2017, still are visiting me and following me, like gang stalking, targeting individuals encounter...They communicated to me...They want to take over the world and the universe...

after
content.summary: Black saucer with occupants lands at colusa river levee, photos of occupants

content.detailedDescription: Basically, i went out with my father to take night time star pictures. we got there and took a few pictures with me as the foreground and we attempted to get the stars and clouds in the background. we took two pictures, one after the other in a certain spot. they both seemed not too different to me so i never noticed it. over a year later, i look back and notice that there's nothing occurring in the first picture, but in he second there's an obvious glowing object n the top right corner. i don't believe its a star trail because it does not exist in the photo taken seconds before. it's very confusing to me and i tried to think of reasons why it wouldn't be in the first picture. but i couldn't think of anything.
content.summary: Did not see in person, looked back in old photos and discovered.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't view the ufo myself in person but 
on tv during a recent weather report.
nasa had send in a video of the aura borealis
from the international space station and i
noticed an illuminated object at the lower left 
moving with the curvature of the earth(with
i thought was just a satellite but then it verde
off into space. when i watched the weather
on the same channel at 11:00 pm the vidieo
was shortened and the object was not seen.
i'm not sure if it was edited on purpose or not
but i was sure someone else saw what i saw
on tv but i didn't here anything. i saw it on 
a local channel 12 nj on the optimum network
the first week of july 2017. geo spaloss
content.summary: Viewed on tv, nasa from space station,northern lights video sent to earth for viewing on tv.

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw the white and orange object i was standing out in my yard having a smoke looking at the stars. i first thought i saw a meteor but the object flashed again and then went dark.Then again father to the east and this time it went orange then real bright light then dark again. it continued across to the east repeating the orange to bright white pattern, then went dark to the south east and never came back again that night. i have seen it three other times over the month. the second object i saw was more startling. i was also watching the sky and noticed two stars that did not seem familiar to me looking from my back yard. i was about to decide i had just not noticed them in the past when the star in back became an extremely intense white and both lights took off toward the east at a fairly swift rate. they did not make any sound , and they did not take off at an ungodly speed, but it did seem they were both part of the same craft. i lost them after they passed the trees out back. i know satellite's and these were not. i would be glad to show them to you just show up around two am. signed: a wish come true.
content.summary: Two seen one moving acros sky silent, other bright star and dim star. bright one became 10 times brighter and both moved off as if one huge craft no sound.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving north at about 1030 pm, noticed 2 red lights roughly 500ft high slowly moving west, one remained at that hight while the other one seemed to lower below 100 ft. it was almost directly overhead but to my left. i didnt stop driving so i didnt get a good enough look at it other than a closer view of the blood red light. also couldnt tell if the light was the entire object or was just underneath it. i will go back out and look up in a few, i only live about 10 minutes from where i saw them so maybe ill get lucky.
content.summary: 2 blood red circles, one continuing and one lowering

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out window at early hours when i seen somthing what looked like a usual star slightly brighter but practically the same as most but this was already moving high up there i've seen things like this that can be accounted for as natural phenomenons, but this one stopped in its path for a few seconds doubled back in a almost straight path stood still then made a curved kind of path as it done this stood still aggain then it kind of glowed a little brighter and done somthing what reminded me of a loop the loop manoeuvre but maybe a half circle but midway during the half loop glowed most intense,it then returned to its usual brightness casually drifted a short distances in the sky then stopped abruptly and blended so well i lost it with the stars.
content.summary: Was looking out window at stars spotted somthing resembling a star moving from stationary then stopping turning back the changing direction aggain and performed some kind of manoeuvre ending like a star aggain to the point where i lost it with the other s

content.detailedDescription: Not a native english speaker,please parden my writing. it was one night last year when my husband was away. only me at home. suddenly i heard voices like tons of people speaking,i was frightened, and decided to record in order to prove only me alone at home. when i finished recording,i found what i had recorded was completely different sound. it was an indescribable sound wave right through the whole recording  with my occasional walking sound. i did not turn on the whole light,so the image was a bit scary. then i saw massive lightening outside window. the unatural massive lightening lightened the whole sky, but it was as low as it was just projecting above the top of the building. in our country,most people live in tall buildings,so as i live on the 13th of a 16 floors building. i couldn't remember how long it lasted,but since then my body was constant  vibrating at home,and sometimes it was like something beating inside.When it does, i took a video of it beating inside my hand. although it was unbelievable, i doubt alliens was experimenting on my body. this is not the whole of the event,but was what i can state here.
content.summary: Heard noises like tons of people speaking once, recorded and found strange voices on tape

content.detailedDescription: A bright light caught my attention, started at it for minutes. found it wierd that it would not move spot, had a good viewing spot from my window. it was bright, flashing the lights i mentioned, with out moving. then it went dark, like it was gone. it was over the mountains, where it is pitch black at this time of the day.
content.summary: Hovered on the same exact spot for minutes, did not move, just glowed, then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: While out filming wildlife, i stopped and took two photos of a hawk. the two photos are only a few seconds apart, the object is only in one photo. i did not see the object until i looked at the pictures i had taken, which unfortunately was over a year later.In the second photo, where the hawk is looking to the side, about beak level and to the right you will see the object.
content.summary: Noticed in picture

content.detailedDescription:
I apologize that i cannot find the contact information from the gentelmen who interviewed me recently. could you please forward this information to them please:
gentlemen,
since our visit, as i promised i would keep a vigilant eye on the sky if you would. i've been able to identify what you thought were military satellites.I've also seen the iss twice, no mistaking that. in retrospect i can confidently say what i saw was neither of those.

my reason for reaching out today is to in form you of several more instances of oddities in the night sky. on at least four occasions, twice with witnesses, i've seen what start out as a bright flash in the sky followed by other flashes of light varying in intensity and clarity. there is no commonality as to where in the sky they begin but event the shortest event (45 sec) consisted of single flashes of light following a somewhat random path. the last one on this wednesday 7/26 began in the se sky moved eastward the turned northward for several minutes until it disappeared from my field of view. as i said, i've seen at least five of these lights since we talked. i have witnesses to two. one military aircraft munitions expert who was speechless except to say "what the fudge is that" over and over again.

there were two sightings that were different from the above and honestly quite disturbing to me. on july 7th at 10:15pm and 10:35pm. first just to the ese of my view i saw what looked like a medicine shaped capsule in the sky. it was quite large but still far away. maybe one inch at arms length. it gave off a cloudy white light with a black stripe in it's center and appeared to be rotating or swirling. as it became more defined the black stripe intensified, it abruptly split in two and vanished. the exact same thing happened that same night in the sky nne of my field of vision.

i can't possibly be the only one who is observing these event o almost a nightly basis if i want to sit and wait long enough. we look into deep space everyday but who's watching our own backyard? the dual encounter on the 7th has me really thinking perhaps i need to think about the potential of the unknown.

regards,
tom
content.summary: Several events of flashing light of various intensity along with course change
